message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. I believe it's worth more than its face value, but I understand everyone has different needs and budgets. To make this opportunity accessible, I propose a special introductory price of $100 for you. This includes not only the product itself but also a complimentary 30-day access to exclusive support and resources. I hope you find this offer appealing and look forward to potentially bringing this valuable asset into your possession.
